title: Buguri
plot: Krishna is engaged to his family friend, Ishanya. Unable to get over his past relationship, he goes in search of his college lover, Nandini.

_Buguri_ (qv) looks at how youngsters are when they start out in college, eager to have fun and find love. But by the last semester, their outlook towards life changes, as the focus shifts to serious studies and making a life out of it. Once they find success in work, they think about love again.
